definition: to overflow/to ripple/used in place names/see 漾濞[Yang4 bi4]
"water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
to ripple/to undulate/also written 蕩漾|荡漾
to ripple/to undulate/also written 蕩漾|荡漾
Yangbi Yizu Autonomous County in Dali Bai autonomous prefecture 大理白族自治州[Da4 li3 Bai2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Yunnan
pinyin: Yang4 bi4 Yi2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 xian4

sentences.english: I love to paint the light reflected off water when it ripples.
sentences.chinese: 我爱画水面漾起涟漪时反射出的粼粼波光。

sentences.english: But it's not like that now .
sentences.chinese: 但是现甾莪已经卜像従媊那漾勒。

sentences.english: On which are inverted dream-like reflections.
sentences.chinese: 许在漾着恋梦似的倒影。

sentences.english: Only such, lets, rippled gently place.
sentences.chinese: 只这样一句，让，温柔漾了一地。

sentences.english: A disciple who is good business sale and purchase of fish, his face Yang Zhao smile.
sentences.chinese: 一个弟子说是卖买鱼的人生意好，脸上漾着笑容。

definition: gleaming reflection of waves in sunlight
long or drawn out/remote in time or space/leisurely/to swing/pensive/worried
to overflow/(literary) excessive/old variant of 鎰|镒[yi4]
to reflect (light)/to shine/to project (an image onto a screen etc)
